rules.text: Behave. While you're free to express your opinions, this freedom does not extend to being mean, disrespectful or derogatory to anyone. If you don't like someone, block them and move on with your life.
Everything is public. Don't post things you would be ashamed of if they became public - even in private messages.
No spam. You may promote material that you created yourself, within reason. Do not tag third parties. If you're unsure if your post or DM might be spammy, it probably is.
Only legal content. Everything must be legal under Swedish and EU law. In edge cases, or if you are unsure, don't click "Publish" in the first place.

No impersonation.

Unless *clearly* stated and clearly evident that you are running a parody/satire/comedy account, you may not assume the name of another individual or entity.
No disinformation. You must make a reasonable, good-faith effort to verify claims of a controversial nature.
